{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Budget 1 Wireless |model=B2004 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date=04/2008 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Netcore |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.7 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88W8510;88W8510-BAN1, AJFJH.2, 0740 B2S, SG H; |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=512 KiB |fla1_brand=KH |fla1_model=KH29LV400CBTC-70G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 MiB |ram1_brand=ISSI |ram1_model=IS42S16400B-6TL |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8510;88W8510-BAN1, AJFJH.2, 0740 B2S, SG H; |wi1_chip2_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip2_model=88W8010;88W8010-NNB1, K688731.3, 0821 B6P, TW; |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060;88E6060-RCJ1, GA1286801.2, 0830 B0C, CN; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=default |default_ssid_regex=^default$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=guest |default_pass=guest |oui=08:10:74 |oui_eth=08:10:74 }} OEM Netcore, similar to the [[Netcore 605GR]] and the [[Zonet ZSR1134WE]]
"PB-724-M04G-30" and "APR 23 2008" is silkscreened on the board.
The power adapter included with the unit is a '''unbranded''' TP090700A (9V, 0.7mA).
